changelog:
• UI & Theme: Complete redesign of the OG Sentence interface.
• Main Page: Added new AutoExec panel – drag & drop scripts for automatic execution; remove via right-click.
• Script Hub: Now compact, organized, and optimized; all category filters fixed.
• Script List: Selecting a script opens the file in a new tab.
• Tabs: Refreshing deactivated tabs is simpler and more stable.
• Themes: Updated color palettes for all themes.
• AutoUpdaterUI: All update URLs updated and file verification improved.
• Minor performance optimizations added.
